text: Willi Altig (born 17 January 1935) is a German former professional racing cyclist. He rode in the 1960 and 1966 Tour de France. He is the older brother of cyclist Rudi Altig. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1935 births Category:Living people Category:German male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Mannheim Category:Tour de France cyclists
title: Willi Altig
